price: 27. »que mi Señor ha perdonado mis pecados y me ha honrado (haciéndome entrar en el paraíso)!».
arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: bimā ghafara lī rabbī wajaʿalanī mina al-muk'ramīna
